name: sjc-leaflet-layer-control
description: A default layer control for Leaflet maps in San Juan County WA

scripts.prepublish: browserify --standalone sjcLeafletLayerControl index.js > sjc-leaflet-layer-control.js && uglifyjs sjc-leaflet-layer-control.js -c -m > sjc-leaflet-layer-control.min.js

author: Nick Peihl <nickpeihl@gmail.com> (http://npeihl.com/)
